attributes.action: once again respond to the treatment of british travellers by french fishermen, by demanding the expulsion of France from the EU.  If that demand is not met in 24 hours then this country should withdraw.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anybody with eyes and a brain can see that France - the people and the government - have no respect for the sovereignty of their EU partners, therefore they should be expelled, and if they are not to be expelled then this country should immediately withdraw, taking all its net financial contributions with it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
